website_summaries.verdict: Ratchet  &  Clank: Full Frontal Assault's one and only competitive multiplayer mode is an enjoyable blend of action and tactics.
pros: Weapons are fun to useGood deal of tactical flexibility allows for exciting comebacksLeague system does a fine job of matching you with appropriate opponents
cons: Short, insubstantial campaignOnly one competitive multiplayer mode

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, Deadlocked NOT included
customer_reviews.text: So. I want to say that the game itself is awesome. It goes right back to the core R&C gameplay while still maintaining a party game's accessibility. Controls are tight, story line is pretty funny, and the game reminds you why Ratchet and Clank is awesome. Unfortunately, PSN says they are no longer providing a digital copy of Ratchet Deadlocked. To be honest, that's why I bought this bundle and I'm really disappointed that it's no longer included.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton

customer_reviews.title: No fun at all
customer_reviews.text: This Ratchet and clank has no puzzles, its all busy work - so annoying. Basically you just collect money and buy defenses for your base and while you are doing that you have to run back to base often to defend against marauders. It is no fun at all. I want some puzzles!
customer_reviews.author: KEVEN J NIELSEN

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this on disc because it was supposed to include Deadlocked and the crossbuy--even printed on the cover--but the extras have been discontinued. I would have bought the digital copy and saved some money if I knew I couldn't get the extra content
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but short tower defense Ratchet & Clank action
customer_reviews.text: It's fun, but it's not long enough. It feels like it's about half of a game. It only has five levels in the main mission. Yes, it's a tower defense version of Ratchet and Clank. It's engaging enough on the first playthrough, but only three of the five campaign levels are worth playing a second time (the first and last level are way too easy otherwise). Co-op mode is nice, and well suited for the game as each player can be in different parts of the level (offense and defense). I haven't played assault mode because you can't play assault mode against local opponents.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: I love the ratchet and clank series and this was good ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ratchet and clank series and this was good but short. The coop is really fun but I felt they could have done more with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Eiste Dievs

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun R&C game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, the tower defense is well executed and it's even fun with 2 players, even younger ones, my 4 year old can help with defending the base while I go out on the offensive attack. That being said, this is not a game for young kids alone, it's actually very challenging and almost nerve racking sometimes with non stop action and exploration. My only complaint is that there is only 5 story levels and one of them is more of a standard Ratchet and clank like level, but it still is worth hours and hours of fun on and offline.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good but not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: We have every R&C game from PS2 to PSP and PS3. Just got Collection to enjoy the first 3 games again. My grandson likes FFA but I find it boring. (Sorry Insomniac!) Very different in the way you acquire weapons (free!) and ammo, but too hard to target lock weapons and too much running around. Run out and whack some bots and then hurry back to defend the base. Not my kind of game, but I'm still a big R&C fan.
customer_reviews.author: le moindre

customer_reviews.title: Very Short but Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I love all Ratchet and Clank games so I thought I would continue the obsession and purchase the latest one. I was pretty disappointed. The game was very short and you had to do the same thing over and over ever level. Protecting the base once was good enough, not 5 more times. I didn’t like how you had to get your weapons either. Overall, it was pretty fun for a short time. it did provide me with entertainment. Good thing it was only $19.99
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills my expectations for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this so far, it's much closer to the older Ratchet games. By which I mean, using a 360 degree camera view. Like that a lot. Thanks. One caveat, I can't start a new game any time I like. And occasionally I do want to do just that. Having to finish the whole game first is a pain when I want to do that. So, as far as that particular part goes, I don't like it. But mainly it's a been a whole lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Tower Defense with a twist
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I was expecting when I pre-ordered it. But that isn't a bad thing. I enjoy tower defense games and I love Ratchet and Clank and practically all things made by Insomniac Games. But this game really delivered more than I was expecting. The controls are fluid and stable and there is a lot to unlock and enjoy as you progress through the various battle areas.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dewey

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Rachet and Clank game
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time player of the entire Rachet and Clank series. This is not a Rachet and Clank game. It is a weird tower defense strategy game with a few elements of Rachet and Clank. Was not happy when I realized this was not the story driven adventure game that I have grown to know and love over the past 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Meath

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite Ractchet & Clank but still tremendously fun. It is a bit shorter than the previous incarnations but the levels are designed to play over and over to increase items and achievements. It also has a bunch of online features that extend the life of this game beyond campaign. All the Ratchet & Clank weaponry and fun with a Plants vs. Zombies feel.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Evans

customer_reviews.title: They loved every bit of the hours it took to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Another Ratchet and Clank for my Husband and my Step son! They loved every bit of the hours it took to play to the end! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Y. - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works like it should
customer_reviews.text: works like it should. was wrapped up like it was new.. couldve been resealed.. but overall it works and was "new"
customer_reviews.author: Tom mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Full Frontal Assault
customer_reviews.text: I received my copy only three days ago, and I like it a lot. Took me 24 hours to complete the first world, as I had no idea what I was doing. At 78, I may hold some sort of speed record for my age group, if there is one for my lingering stay in the shadows of my geezerhood. The average time for this world is 22 minutes; although I played without any assistance from Clank and the Q, which makes the game much more challenging. I failed a lot, but it was fun while failing. Very good game, but no strategy guide is available for it, so I must tinker around and try to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Deadlocked still included.
customer_reviews.text: The mediocre reviews initially turned me off on this game, but I decided to purchase it since Ratchet: Deadlocked was one of my favorite PlayStation 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan10

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game because after searching references, I think it is excellent, I will get several hours of fun and challenge to those who like the genre. Also, I give this rating, because apart from that it is a great game, the quality of service provided by amazon. com, is always in the top, providing a quality service. I recommend the game and service to everyone reading this comment
customer_reviews.author: Evelan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: The game is a little buggy. I had the game crash several times at random points. Local co-op doesn't feel quite right and I haven't tried online co-op because I don't know anyone else that owns this game. The game is pretty cheap though so that makes up for the poor local co-op. They may fix the crashing issues with an update. The game is different from previous Ratchet and Clank games but is still fun and probably worth the 19.99 price it released at.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Short and Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this Ratchet and Clank game! They worked in this whole tower defense idea into a R&C game really well! However this game is incredibly short! You will probably beat this game in a day or two. Overall, I would say this game is worth playing. But you are left wanting more when it is over.
customer_reviews.author: DrumDude

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn't like it as much as the rest of the series
customer_reviews.text: Not your normal R&C. At first I didn't like it as much as the rest of the series. Once I got into the strategy and timing, I liked it a lot. I'm at the end of the game now and I finding the final hard. Worth the money without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Good game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good game. Similar to previous Ratchet and Clank games!
customer_reviews.author: Tck51690

customer_reviews.title: A very difficult game...
customer_reviews.text: Over all a very good challenging game but rated It 4 out of 5 because It could have had more save spots as some sections were very long and the biggest problem was finding where to go next. Would have been better If they had planets listed In order and then checked as you go.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Clicked for full frontal, by the game anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I know you only clicked on this item because it said "Full Frontal". But you should order it anyway. It's a great game.
customer_reviews.author: TrusstMe I am a Professional

customer_reviews.title: gettin back to good old rachet
customer_reviews.text: A genuine relief from all 4 one ... not up to the best, but turning back i hope. Up Your Arsenal is my fav of all, Tools of Destruction was durn good, Crack in Timme good, Deadlocked up there ... so i hope they are headed that way again. This one is in some ways a good first game for you, but really different in feel though not near as bad as All 4 One. I would buy it again, i did enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: billb

customer_reviews.title: Like Buying it from Gamestop
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game as a Christmas present to my big brother and it is great. The box came encased in protective plastic to make sure it had not be tampered with and my brother hasn't had any problems with the disk (like it skipping or having scratches). It's perfect, just like if I had walked into GameStop and bought it new (it was actually cheaper buying it from Amazon than GameStop by a few bucks).
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Love Ratchet and Clank!
customer_reviews.text: We love this series, and this game lives up to our expectations set by the previous R&C games. I find all the different controls for various functions difficult to remember, so I usually just watch my husband play and find it enjoyable. Don't hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fun hybrid game
customer_reviews.text: I love the series and this game doesn't disappoint but it also is very different. it is actually really fun multiplayer and is a great way for non fans to enter the series. a blend of tower defense and the traditional ratchet universe.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyede06

customer_reviews.title: Ratchet is back.
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't like the last one. After years of good games, they changed the movement controls and I thought that really sucked and was hard to get used to. The old controls are back and I"m having a good time with this one
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Wyke

customer_reviews.title: r&c
customer_reviews.text: first off i love the ratchet and clank series. so, i was pumped to get this game! however, i haven't played it much because it's not as fun and i have a hard time getting into this game as much as the others. the others totally hooked me

customer_reviews.title: For Multiplayer best.
customer_reviews.text: This game is a bit too short and the first player while different.. just does not fit the Ratchet and clank franchise. The game was clearly developed with multiplayer on mind.

customer_reviews.text: Love my ratchet n clank fun for hours with lots of silliness to enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: While recovering from a surgery, unable to get around, I found this game tons of fun.

customer_reviews.text: I'm a super fan, I don't think I need say more. I collect these and didn't have all of them, I found this one at an affordable price so I bought it so that my son and I can enjoy it together as we are both big fans of the franchise.

The third planet is crap until you find the swingshot (which is so annoying) But I guess if it were an "Actual" game like the previous ones rather than a specific download, it would've been better.

customer_reviews.text: I did not like Full Frontal Assult. I LOVED Tools of Destruction and A Crack In Time. Please go back to games like that. There was more story telling and strategy and more fun in those.

customer_reviews.title: It includes deadllocked which is amazing still so you pay 10$ and get a free ...

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This game is not like the other R&C games. Well, it is sort of like Dead Locked (which I completely hated). The first 3 games were amazing but anything after Up Your Arsenal just sucks.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun addition to the Ratchet series. The price was excellent even if the game seems to be a little shorter than the previous games.
customer_reviews.author: Chris1226

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing this and so far I'm loving it. I'm a 68 year-old grandma so my reactions aren't as fast as they used to be, but this game is forgiving enough for me to slowly progress. I DO get killed a lot, but don't have to go back too far to start again. I'm sure a good player would still find a lot of fun in this game. I have played other R&C games and don't remember the Pyroblaster (or whatever it's called); really fun to use on those suckers! Like all the other games, there are lots of funny cracks made by Ratchet and the colors are bright and clear. It's just a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: N. Booth

customer_reviews.title: we love Ratchet & Clank
customer_reviews.text: We are ratchet and clank fans, and purchased this as a gift to my husband. we've played every game since the original. its a must have for any collector or fan. it isnt as long as a full on game but it'll keep you busy a while!

customer_reviews.title: Ratchet and Clank, 'nuff said...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so Amazon requires a few more words, and this game definitely deserves a LOT more. If you're into base defense, or if you liked the combat arena from R&C Going Commando, then this one will definitely please. If you're not into those kinds of gameplay, then no worries, this game has got you covered too with classic R&C campaign style gameplay. It's an all around good game to play with the consistent high-quality we've all come to expect from Insomniac games.

customer_reviews.title: A short fun one
customer_reviews.text: Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault (Ratchet and Clank: QForce outside of North America) was announced on May 30, 2011. The game was announced as part of a 'surprise' from Insomniac Games to mark the 10th anniversary since the original game was released.[9] The gameplay is described as a tower defense, a deviation from the platforming/combat common to the rest of the series, where Ratchet has to fight enemies over 5 levels on 3 different planets. It was released on November 27, 2012 on the PlayStation 3 with the PlayStation Vita version delayed until May 21, 2013.[10]

It still says it includes the vita version on the case, but I guess it's false advertisement. I'm a little upset with insomniac games as a long time fan. I might just pass on the reboot now

customer_reviews.author: jeremiah tellier

customer_reviews.title: Best Rachet and Clank yet
customer_reviews.text: Rachet and Clank are one of my favorite gaming duos. This is by far the most challenging of the set. I have played on several occasions until my thumbs hurt. Giving this one 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: WLC

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for cross buy
customer_reviews.text: I know they are giving away deadlocked because cross buy is so delayed, but I wanted to play it on vita and they have the logo on the box. I expected it to be available with the game, not months later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Rachet and Clank Rule!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and enjoyed another installment of Rachet and Clank...The dual screen has a few jumpy spots, but in general we like the new game!
customer_reviews.author: mel340

customer_reviews.title: The product is incomplete! No cross play app available...
customer_reviews.text: The cross play application still isn't available although it clearly states that pit was included. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jawara Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great game. It was shipped, and delivered a day early. It's a great new addition to the tower defense genre, with the same Ratchet and Clank feel. You basically build up base defenses, unlock the weapons from weapons crates, and do all the fun R&C stuff! Great game for anyone who loves the R&C series, or a great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: A good different
customer_reviews.text: Full Frontal Assault isn't your standard Ratchet & Clank. It's a tower defense game with elements from the R&C series. All of your favorite VA's are here and so is the humor. It is admittedly short (4-5 hours, depending on skill,) but for the price point, it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio M. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for getting this product to me so fast,you made my nephew's Christmas, his just loves his games. Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann Summerlin

product_meta.title: Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault - Playstation 3
feature_bullets: Fan favorite Ratchet & Clank game play attributes return (departure from R&C: All 4 One)
Full array of new weapons including new gameplay components (base defense, PVP)
Showcase Cross play and Cross saves with PS3/PS Vita : Compete in battle arenas on either the PS3 or PS Vita
Incredible Cross Buy value $19.99 get two versions (PS3 Blu ray AND the PS Vita version (download)
